review: Easy to setup, easy to use
author: Edwin Rauda

review: Well worth the Price...... Prime membership is a great thing.
author: Ronnie L. Bixler

review: So easy to use! Love it!
author: tis mims

review: Absolutely love it.  Easy to install and works like a charm.  Wish I had cut the cable and gone this way a long time ago.
author: Bethanne Delgaudio "North Country"

review: It was a choice between adding cable in my son's room or the fire stick and since he doesn't watch much TV, we opted for the fire stick.  He is happy and we are happy. All of the shows that he used to watch is available on the fire stick and the many games.....LOVE IT!!! For us, there isn't any extra cost to adding a cable box or more wires in our home. Plug in the fire stick, one time payment....no more to be said.
author: DJ

review: I was surprised by how well it worked.  I expected it to be much slower than the amazon fire tv.  To my surprise it runs really smoothly.
author: Katie Burleson "Ezz"

review: I would like it wirelessly connect my laptop to my tv like some of their competitors *cough* google *cough* Other than that though, it is great.
author: Trevor Vaughan

review: Love it! So easy to use!
author: Katie A. Helms
